name: Trackless
description: Trackless is an atmospheric first-person exploration and puzzle game set in the distant future. Trackless uses text input that allows you to interact with characters and objects. Using your in-game phone will help you find clues and give you special abilities.
minimum_requirements: Минимальные: ОС: Windows 7 Процессор: 2.0 GHz Оперативная память: 2 GB ОЗУ Видеокарта: 1 GB+ of video RAM DirectX: Версии 9.0c Место на диске: 1 GB
